Package org.apache.tamaya.spisupport

Class DefaultConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tamaya.spisupport.DefaultConfigurationBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreConfigurationBuilder
    public class DefaultConfigurationBuilder
extends Object
implements ConfigurationBuilder
    Default implementation of ConfigurationBuilder.

      • setContext

        public ConfigurationBuilder setContext​(ConfigurationContext context)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Init this builder instance with the given ConfigurationContext instance. This method will use any existing property sources, filters, converters and the combination policy of the given ConfigurationContext and initialize the current builder with them. All previous property sources, filters, converters and the combination policy of this instance will be replaced.
        Specified by:
        setContext in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Parameters:
        context - the ConfigurationContext instance to be used, not null.
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • addDefaultPropertySources

        public ConfigurationBuilder addDefaultPropertySources()
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Adds all registered (default) property sources to the context built. The sources are ordered based on their ordinal values and added to the chain of property sources with higher priority.
        Specified by:
        addDefaultPropertySources in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder

        Specified by:

      • getPropertySources

        public List<PropertySource> getPropertySources()
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Access the current chain of property sources. Items at the end of the createList have precedence/higher significance.
        Specified by:
        getPropertySources in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Returns:
        the property source chain, never null.

      • increasePriority

        public ConfigurationBuilder increasePriority​(PropertySource propertySource)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Increases the priority of the given property source, by moving it towards the end of the chain of property sources. If the property source given is already at the end this method has no effect. This operation does not change any ordinal values.
        Specified by:
        increasePriority in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Parameters:
        propertySource - the property source to be incresed regarding its significance.
        Returns:
        the builder for chaining.

      • decreasePriority

        public ConfigurationBuilder decreasePriority​(PropertySource propertySource)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Decreases the priority of the given property source, by moving it towards the start of the chain of property sources. If the property source given is already the first this method has no effect. This operation does not change any ordinal values.
        Specified by:
        decreasePriority in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Parameters:
        propertySource - the property source to be decresed regarding its significance.
        Returns:
        the builder for chaining.

      • highestPriority

        public ConfigurationBuilder highestPriority​(PropertySource propertySource)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Increases the priority of the given property source to be maximal, by moving it to the tail of the of property source chain. If the property source given is already the last item this method has no effect. This operation does not change any ordinal values.
        Specified by:
        highestPriority in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Parameters:
        propertySource - the property source to be maximized regarding its significance.
        Returns:
        the builder for chaining.

      • lowestPriority

        public ConfigurationBuilder lowestPriority​(PropertySource propertySource)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Decreases the priority of the given property source to be minimal, by moving it to the start of the chain of property source chain. If the property source given is already the first item this method has no effect. This operation does not change any ordinal values.
        Specified by:
        lowestPriority in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Parameters:
        propertySource - the property source to be minimized regarding its significance.
        Returns:
        the builder for chaining.

      • addPropertyFilters

        public ConfigurationBuilder addPropertyFilters​(Collection<PropertyFilter> filters)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Adds the given PropertyFilter instances, hereby the instances are added to the end of the createList with highest priority. The ordering of existing property filters remains unchanged. To sort the property filters call ConfigurationBuilder.sortPropertyFilter(java.util.Comparator<org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertyFilter>).
        Specified by:
        addPropertyFilters in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Parameters:
        filters - the filters to addPropertyValue
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • removePropertyFilters

        public ConfigurationBuilder removePropertyFilters​(Collection<PropertyFilter> filters)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Removes the given PropertyFilter instances, if existing. The order of the remaining filters is preserved.
        Specified by:
        removePropertyFilters in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Parameters:
        filters - the filter to remove
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • removePropertyConverters

        public <T> ConfigurationBuilder removePropertyConverters​(TypeLiteral<T> typeToConvert,
                                                         Collection<PropertyConverter<T>> converters)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Removes the given PropertyConverter instances for the given type, if existing.
        Specified by:
        removePropertyConverters in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Type Parameters:
        T - the target type.
        Parameters:
        typeToConvert - the type which the converter is used
        converters - the converter to remove
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • removePropertyConverters

        public ConfigurationBuilder removePropertyConverters​(TypeLiteral<?> typeToConvert)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Removes all converters for the given type, which actually renders a given type unsupported for type conversion.
        Specified by:
        removePropertyConverters in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Parameters:
        typeToConvert - the type which the converter is used
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

      • addPropertyConverters

        public <T> ConfigurationBuilder addPropertyConverters​(TypeLiteral<T> type,
                                                      Collection<PropertyConverter<T>> propertyConverters)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        This method can be used for adding PropertyConverters. Converters are added at the end after any existing converters. For converters already registered for the current target type the method has no effect.
        Specified by:
        addPropertyConverters in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Type Parameters:
        T - the target type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type for which the converter is used
        propertyConverters - the PropertyConverters to addPropertyValue for this type
        Returns:
        this builder, for chaining, never null.

        Specified by:
        build in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Returns:
        a new Configuration configuration instance, never null.

      • sortPropertyFilter

        public ConfigurationBuilder sortPropertyFilter​(Comparator<PropertyFilter> comparator)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationBuilder
        Sorts the current registered property filters using the given comparator.

        NOTE: property filters at the beginning have minimal significance.

        Specified by:
        sortPropertyFilter in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Parameters:
        comparator - the comparator to be used, not null.
        Returns:
        this instance for chaining.

        Sorts the current registered property sources using the given comparator.

        NOTE: property sources at the beginning have minimal significance.

        Specified by:
        sortPropertySources in interface ConfigurationBuilder
        Parameters:
        comparator - the comparator to be used, not null.
        Returns:
        this instance for chaining.
